com.app.towerDefense.models

Class Shooter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.towerDefense.models.Tower
      • com.app.towerDefense.models.Shooter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Shooter
extends Tower
    Tower abstract class is the super-typer of all types of objects produced by the TowerFactory. This class create a Shooter tower from the tower class .
    Author:
    George Ekow-Daniels
    See Also:
    Tower
